testsuite.name: Comprar productos en SauceDemo

testcase.name: Validar compra exitosa en SauceDemo

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: a string containing "THANK YOU FOR YOUR ORsDER" ignoring case but: was "Thank you for your order!"
